Engine.enginePackage

Interface EnginePlayerIO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerInputRecorder, RehearsalIO, ResumerIO, StorytellerPlayerIO

    public interface EnginePlayerIO
    Interface for providing player input to the engine.

    The engine calls the methods of this interface to communicate with the player.

    Its main purpose is to provide a clean way to feed the engine with recorded player input when loading a saved story or collecting log data.

                throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Get the player input. Throws a Janus.StopEngineException if there is no more input available. Can throw InterruptedException because they may block waiting for buffer space to place log data or the user my stop the session.
